release.action: Use maven assembly descriptor to assemble instead of the pde-maven-plugin.
Check if there is a repository configured at startup. If none available, use the default repository.
Add new view to display the RO_ACCESS_REPORT in a tabular form.
Move all the repository code into the llrp adapter.
Add new settings to the preferences menu in order to allow external databases (MySQL and PostgreSQL).

When sending an LLRP message to multiple readers via the "send LLRP message" dialog, the LLRP Commander does not correctly "remember" the used readers for recurring sends. The failure occurs, if a reader gets removed or added between to subsequent sends.
